credit_line: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
title: Sampler
provenance:
By 1941, Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
1941, Museum for the Arts of Decoration of the Cooper Union
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery, linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross and eyelet stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Scene showing a man and woman in formal dress, labeled as Adam and Eve, another lady and gentleman (unfinished), baskets of flowers and fruit, flowering trees, birds, and an inscription, arranged in four horizontal rows and enclosed in a simple zigzag border.
name: Sampler
